title: LiveLogger should be a distributed logger
body:
LiveLogger should follow the best practices in 
https://learn.microsoft.com/visualstudio/msbuild/writing-multi-processor-aware-loggers. 
Specifically it should be forwarding only the events it cares about to the 
central node for performance.

This is also a great time to do a tech review of this documentation and 
see if anything should be updated.
